GSD.product_version: versions from v4.6 to before v5.18.6
GSD.description:
tty: goldfish: Fix free_irq() on remove

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.6 by commit a6fcd7ffd76a9c1d998a2d02d518c78a55c5bed8, it was introduced in version v4.6 by commit 465893e18878e119d8d0255439fad8debbd646fd. For more details please see the references link.
